short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide YouTube's recommendation thumbnails to avoid distractions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you spend too much time watching YouTube? Focused YouTube is a Chrome Extension that enables you to eliminate all distractions while using YouTube. 

Search YouTube with a beautiful, thumbnail-free home screen. Enjoy your videos without distracting recommended videos vying for your attention.
